subject: Soccer
Bribery and Kickbacks
lead_paragraph: FIFA president Sepp Blatter has hinted he might try to extend his reign, even as a corruption scandal engulfs the organization, which apparently lacks an internal candidate free of controversy to replace him.
snippet: FIFA president Sepp Blatter has hinted he might try to extend his reign, even as a corruption scandal engulfs the organization, which apparently lacks an internal candidate free of controversy to replace him.
